text:
@realDonaldTrump @CNN So, like when you say you're not going to fire someone and then you do. Or when you say you didn't cheat on your wife, when you did. Or how you tell everyone you're doing a tremendous job with the coronavirus, but 60,000 families would disagree...

Is it just like that?
